item.title: Web Developers' Guide to Web Intents in Chrome
item.description: Last year Google proposed the Web Intents API to help web applications integrate with one another with minimal effort. They have now enabled an experimental version of the API in the most recent stable version of Chrome. For more information on Web Intents and to see just how powerful they can be, check out the following links: Web Developers’ Guide to Web Intents in Chrome A brief introduction to Web Intents [YouTube] webintents.
